column5: In this neck of the woods,the bass are usually of the nest by July 1. This guy was still guarding his nest under my boatlift on Fri,I think he was hanging around till I took his pic.      Everytime we waded in his area he would come out & give a warning tap on the ankles.
Great Pic and it's the same out on Erie right now, I am still seeing the odd smallie on the beds, it's a late season that's for sure.
cool pic!  thanks for sharing  cheers!
nice pic how big is that fish, it would be something to see a 5 ponder come at you lol
